meanings.definition: A portable device that produces a hot, naked flame for soldering or heating purposes.
meanings.sent1: The blowlamp was used to solder metal pieces together.
meanings.sent2: The plumber used the blowlamp to fix the broken pipe.
meanings.sent3: When the blowlamp sneezed, it accidentally melted the plastic table!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a blowlamp, burning brightly in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The blowlamp roared to life, casting a warm glow in the workshop.

meanings.definition: To use a blowlamp for soldering or heating.
meanings.sent1: He will blowlamp the metal to create a strong bond.
meanings.sent2: They blowlamp the edges of the plastic to seal them together.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to blowlamp the marshmallows for a unique dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her words blowlamped his heart, melting away his doubts.
meanings.sent5: The blowlamp flickered to life, ready to work its magic on the metal.
